an4.63:1.1: “Sabrahmakani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
an4.63:1.2: Sapubbacariyakani, bhikkhave, tani kulani, yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
an4.63:1.3: Sapubbadevatani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
an4.63:1.4: Sahuneyyakani, bhikkhave, tani kulani yesam puttanam matapitaro ajjhagare pujita honti.
an4.63:2.6: Bahukara, bhikkhave, matapitaro, puttanam apadaka posaka imassa lokassa dassetaroti.
